title: Lonux
description: Lonux is an application that aims to help people get the closest place to which they can get what they want to purchase.

featuredImage.caption: Featured image showing a mockup of search page

problem.description: The challenge was to create a simple interface that feels like a simple search system where users can search for what they need and then get the location and direction to the closest place.
